cds::queue::MoirQueue< gc::hzp_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR > Class Template Reference

A variation of Michael & Scott lock-free queue based on Hazard Pointer GC. More...

#include <moir_queue_hzp.h>

Detailed Description

template<typename T, class TRAITS, class ALLOCATOR>
class cds::queue::MoirQueue< gc::hzp_gc, T, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >

A variation of Michael & Scott lock-free queue based on Hazard Pointer GC.

The algorithm is a variation of Michael & Scott's queue algorithm. It overloads dequeue function.

Source:
  • [2000] Simon Doherty, Lindsay Groves, Victor Luchangco, Mark Moir "Formal Verification of a practical lock-free queue algorithm"
  • [2002] Maged M.Michael "Safe memory reclamation for dynamic lock-freeobjects using atomic reads and writes"
  • [2003] Maged M.Michael "Hazard Pointers: Safe memory reclamation for lock-free objects"
Template parameters:
  • T Type of data saved in queue's node
  • TRAITS Traits class (see cds::queue::traits)
  • ALLOCATOR Memory allocator class
Interface: see Queue common interface.
